- Ceiling vent: White plastic grille, louvered, mounted in drywall ceiling; secured with two screws.
- Surrounding drywall: Hairline cracks and paint cracking along wall-ceiling junction near vent.
- Gap/caulking: Small gap at vent frame edge; reseal for air seal and finish.
- Moisture indicators: No visible water stains or mold around vent.
- Maintenance: Vacuum/dust grille; inspect HVAC ductwork if airflow is reduced or noise develops.
